name: Avoid using VBScript blocks (Javascript/HTML5)
description: This rule will check the use of VBScript
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
reference:
– Microsoft VBScript Deprecation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/whats-new/deprecated-features
– WHATWG HTML Living Standard – Scripting Languages: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/scripting.html#scriptingLanguages
– MDN <script> Element: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/script
remediation: Rewrite logic in JavaScript and remove VBScript blocks.
remediationSample:
<script>
function showMessage() {
  alert("Hello from JavaScript");
}
</script>

<button onclick="showMessage()">Click</button>
sample:
<script language="VBScript">
Sub ShowMessage()
  MsgBox "Hello from VBScript"
End Sub
</script>

<button onclick="ShowMessage">Click</button>
